text: What is the default value of `save_idxs` for `solve`? (I'm really asking the actual default value in code). I'm trying to find the default values, can someone share where in DiffEqBase.jl are the defaults defined? I couldn't find them in `common_defaults.jl` or `solve.jl`.

text:
I think it's solver dependent. For example: OrdinaryDiffEq: <https://github.com/SciML/OrdinaryDiffEq.jl/blob/0e38705ac4ace80a51961d689ff64bea6b3bce73/src/solve.jl#L18>
DiffEqBase._init is actually SciMLBase_.__init which is just an invocation: <https://github.com/SciML/SciMLBase.jl/blob/69d65a61d1c0d162a4e7d953e6e4eb65b0b3262d/src/SciMLBase.jl#L14>
